title: Kanye West's savage takedown of Kim Kardashian's ex-husband Kris Humphries

Kanye West took a savage swipe at his wife Kim Kardashian 's ex-husband.

The rapper, who married the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star in 2014, poked fun at his wife's short-lived former marriage to the basketball player.

He made the cutting remarks as he filmed a special Carpool Karaoke episode on a plane with The Late Late Show's James Corden.

In the 20-minute episode, dubbed Airpool Karaoke, James and Kanye sing with the help of his Sunday Service choir and chat about life.

As the conversation turns to dad-of-four Kanye's marriage, James says: "Now marriage I think, has been a real great stabler for you."

(Image: WireImage)

Kanye responds: "People thought it would be uncool to be married, then I got married and people were like, 'Oh that looks cool'."

James jumps in: "No one ever thought it would be uncool to marry Kim Kardashian . Everybody thought it would be cool to marry Kim Kardashian."

"Well not Kris Humphries," Kanye jokes.

As James laughs, Kanye continues: "It's more than cool, it's more than cool as hell or something, it's heavenly, it's great, it's magnificent, and God is using me as a human being.

(Image: E!l/PLANET PHOTOS)

"You know, as humbly as I can put it, he's using me to show off. Last year, I made $115million and still ended up $35million in debt.

"This year, I looked up and I just got $68million returned to me on my tax returns and people say, 'Don't talk about these numbers', but people need to hear someone that has been put into debt by the system talk about these kind of numbers now they're in service to Christ."

Kanye went on to say his spiritual awakening is part of his success and to reiterate that God is using him to "show off".

(Image: WireImage)

The rapper, 42, also described a normal night in for him and his famous wife.

He said after eating dinner and playing with the kids, Kim watches Dateline and he reads the bible.

Kim famously split from her husband NBA player Kris just 72 days after they tied the knot.

They got engaged in May 2011 after seven months of dating and the wedding was filmed for a two-part special of her reality series.

Kim filed for divorce 72 days later, citing irreconcilable differences and faced claims that the marriage was nothing but a publicity stunt.

She began dating Kanye in April 2012, when she was still legally married to Kris.

Their divorce was finalised on June 3, 2013 and she got engaged to Kanye on October 21 that year, on her 33rd birthday.

They married in Italy on May 24, 2014.
